value.string: Author : Banabihari Pradhan, Updated : Adita Badiyani
This is a  bot , which runs all the time in a trigger loop and triggers different Business processes on receiving emails in mail box
Modified By :  Banabihari , Date : 5th May , Fine tune the code
Modified By :  Adita , Date : 2nd June, Added the Logic for Finance Process. Redesigned to accomodate trigger logic for both HR and Finance processes.
0.1 Supply Input parameters : Comment on GO-LIVE,  This step is to supply the input parameters of the bot if any to run the bot independently, mostly used for debuging purpose
1. Configuration :  This section is to set the configuration parameters. Set dicConfig from master config i_Config
The email subject for starting the bot is not correct.Contact system administrator.

The subject line in your email is not correct. Please contact system administrator.

Regards,
ESSPL RPA

2.1.2. Trigger the HR - Talent Acquisition Process

value.string: 2. Core Coding Section:  Business code starts from here

variables.name: prompt-assignment
variables.description: A variable you can use for assignments

variables.name: i_Config
variables.description: Holds all configuration data for all bots

variables.name: strEmailSubject
variables.description: This holds the Subject Line of the Email which is picked up by the Bot.

variables.name: lstEmailSubject
variables.description: This holds the list of Subjects of emails which are picked up by the Bot

variables.name: strConfigFilePath
variables.description: This holds the file location of Configuration file in local system.

variables.name: strTrigerEmailIds
variables.description: This holds the email Ids in string form separated by ';'. Trigger bot shall listen to emails from these email ids only for processing.

variables.name: strEmailSubjectConst
variables.description: This holds the constant value of the Email Subject, which is same for all emails sent.

variables.name: strFinParaMonthYear
variables.description: This holds the parameters for Finance project. The parameters being Month and Year.

variables.name: strFinParaSoftexNo
variables.description: This holds the parameters for Finance project. The parameters being Softex start no. and end no.

variables.name: strEmailSubjectProjCode
variables.description: This holds the Project Code, which is sent in the Subject of the email

variables.name: lstParameters
variables.description: This temporarily holds the parameters which are split by delimiters

variables.name: dicProjParameters
variables.description: This holds the Project parameters and its value sent in the emails.

variables.name: isEmailConnectionOpen
variables.description: This holds if the Email server connection is open or closed

variables.name: strHRBotAction
variables.description: This holds for which action is the BOT to be executed. Eg : EXTRACT or DOWNLOAD

variables.name: tsBotStartTime
variables.description: This holds the date and time when the Bot starts execution.
